source: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_SEQ_00<tab>Rammbroes has reasons to look concerned, for even a single hippogryph attack is no joke─let alone three.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_SEQ_00<tab>「聖コイナク財団の調査地」のラムブルースは、魔物の出没に悩んでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_SEQ_01<tab>Several members of the Sons of Saint Coinach excavation have been attacked by hippogryphs on the crystallized plain, and the injuries show these were no frisky bumps. Rammbroes bids you cull three of the churlish creatures.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_SEQ_01<tab>北のクリスタル地帯に<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2031501 /var>が出没し、調査員が襲われているらしい。「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2031501 /var>」を3体討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain three hippogryphs, and are forced to agree with Rammbroes that they had unusual fleetness of foot and ferity of spirit. Let Rammbroes know the deed is done.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2031501 /var>を討伐した。聖コイナク財団の調査地の「ラムブルース」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_SEQ_03<tab>The ruins under excavation by the Sons have barely begun giving up their secrets. If the site is indeed home to the builders of the Crystal Tower, it should serve to offer an invaluable insight into the distant past.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_SEQ_03<tab>ラムブルースたちが調査している古代アラグ帝国の遺跡には、失われた叡智が秘められているらしい。遺跡の調査を進めれば、未だ謎に包まれている古代文明のことが解るかもしれないというが……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_000<tab>You are the adventurer <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, are you not? Several of our surveyors have been wounded by hippogryphs in the crystallized area to the north. It is astonishing how fleet and fierce they are in this region.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_000ここから北のクリスタル地帯に魔物が出没するようなんだ。
実際に、何人かの調査員が襲われて困っているんだよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_001<tab>Yet we must teach them to flee, not charge, when the Sons of Saint Coinach are about their scholarly business. I suggest you cull a few of the hippogryphs that they might learn this lesson.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_001このまま被害が増えれば、発掘調査に影響が出るだろう。
調査地の責任者として、放っておくわけにはいかない。
すまないが「」を討伐してくれないか。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_020<tab>Ah, our protector returns! Thank you for performing your duties with such speed. We will be able to plan a survey <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((first thing on the morrow)) ((this very afternoon)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((this very evening)) ((first thing on the morrow)) /var>)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_020ありがとう、助かったよ。
これで、ひとまず調査員たちの安全は確保できただろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_021<tab>These ruins of ancient Allag represent entire branches of lost knowledge. It was the Allagans who built the Crystal Tower, or so the best theories say.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_021古代アラグ文明の遺跡は、まさに失われた叡智の結晶さ。
彼らは、あの「クリスタルタワー」を造ったとされている。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_022<tab>If that is the case, could these ruins not be the remains of a village, nay, a town for workers and their families? Does it hold the record of their lives, spent erecting the shining edifice that beguiles us today?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_022この辺りの遺跡は、クリスタルタワーの建築を行った
作業員とその家族の居住区跡ではないかと考えているのだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_023<tab>All research on the tower is at a standstill. They are stymied by its perfection. But here...we may learn something here. At least, that is what we hope.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC504_00992_RAMMBROES_000_023この地を調査することで、謎多き古代アラグ文明について
何かが解るかもしれない……。
そう、期待しているのだよ。
